name: Harold After
description:
(My first game)
Genetic turn-base battle RPG. (Boss rush pretty much)

Battle your way through 5 bosses.

Only have 2 chances of shopping.

2 types of play-style (For shopping equipments):
Become high damage, but lower defense, pretty risky but finishes the game fast.
Or become low damage but high defense, easy but slows you bit finishing the game. (Not entirely just about damage & defense in game.)

Little story:
Harold just finishes the quest of finding a holy sword, when he came back for his friends, he found out they were captured by the Dark Lord. Will Harold defeat the Dark Lord alone?

-The game is made for Harold's Last Stand Game Jam

Use arrow keys to move, z/space/enter key for action, x/esc/num 0 for cancel.
Mouse left click action, right click for cancel.

F3 to toggle zoom out for game.
F4 to toggle full screen.
F5 to restart game. (To main menu.)

Known bugs:
Battle UI MP & TP numbers may have 2 layers of texts while using a skill.


Credits are in "www" file, Credit.txt.

Currently windows download only.
